channel.description: Recent content in soccer on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I analyzed the data of the soccer FIFA World Cup Russia tournament with soccer action
item.description: **This is the 18th day article of ADVENT CALENDER of NTT DOCOMO Service Innovation Department. ** Hello! This is Osugi from NTT DoCoMo. I spent soccer and futsal when I was a student, and now I am doing marketing related data analysis. Today, I’d like to introduce socceraction, a python package for soccer, by analyzing the game data from the 2018 FIFA World Cup Russia tournament. #Introduction socceraction is featured in the KDD2019 Appried Data Sciense Track Best Paper Award ”Actions Speak Louder than Goals: Valuing Player Actions in Soccer” [^1].
